article_title: Absence of government in Gaza fuels chaotic environment.
sentence: But,  my  understanding  from  talking  to  aid  organisations  who  have  been  operating  there  for  months  -  during  which  many,  many  Palestinian  aid  workers  have  been  killed  -  is  even  though  they  co-ordinate  with  Israel  they  still  get  attacked.
